name: Castle vs Spaceships
description:
Anything can happen in a child's mind... Build your castle to protect your pirates from incoming spaceships!

Made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer for Kenney Game Jam 2019 (Theme: Unlikely Combinations)

Credits: All Code & Design by Thomas Bringer. All Art by Kenney. Music is Vexento - Oh Look, Aliens! https://soundcloud.com/vexento/vexento-oh-look-aliens
